SELECT DEST_TABLE, DEST_COLUMN, DATA_TYPE, INDEX_FLAG, SYNC_FLAG, DEAL_FLAG, DEAL_VALUE, TRIGGER_FLAG, CHG_TABLE, OPER_FLAG FROM IN_CBTABLE_SYNC_RELATION WHERE SOURCE_TABLE=#SOURCE_TABLE# AND DEST_TABLE=#DEST_TABLE# ORDER BY DEST_TABLE ASC
